short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just type in keyboard and do the math. No need to open the calculator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do the math at fingertips. Just using the keyboard.
Press 'Control+Shift+C' in your keyboard, start typing and get results.

Web version of this is hosted here:  https://www.typetocalculate.in/

Features:
- No use of mouse needed.
- Supports variables
- Supports currency conversions like '1 usd to gbp', '3 usd in inr'
- Supports conversion of length, temperature, area, volume, time, etc. Refer to supported conversions https://mathjs.org/docs/datatypes/units.html#reference
- 'Ctrl + Enter' to copy the last result to clipboard
- Click on any of the result to copy to clipboard

With Type To Calculate, users can save time by avoiding the hassle of opening a calculator program. The extension provides a convenient way to perform math operations directly within the browser, making it a handy tool for those who frequently work with numbers.

Open Source Code: https://github.com/gokulk16/type-to-calculate
